entry.title: New release for Lissen: 1.3.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Smart Continue listening shortcat by @GrakovNe in https://github.com/GrakovNe/lissen-android/pull/171

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GrakovNe/lissen-android/compare/1.3.21...1.3.22

Now you can continue playback by long-pressing the app icon:
